mapper.insert: insert into crawler (N_Title, N_IMG, N_Source, URL, C_Group, C_Time) select #{N_Title}, #{N_IMG}, #{N_Source}, #{URL}, #{C_Group}, #{C_Time} from dual where not exists (select * from crawler where N_Title = #{N_Title})

insert into crawler (S_User, S_Content, S_Addr, C_Group, C_Time) select #{S_User}, #{S_Content}, #{S_Addr}, #{C_Group}, #{C_Time} from dual where not exists (select * from crawler where S_Content = #{S_Content})
mapper.select: select C_Number, C_Group, N_Title, N_IMG, N_Source, URL from Crawler where C_Group = #{C_Group} order by C_Time desc
select C_Number, C_Group, S_Content, S_Addr, S_User from Crawler where C_Group = #{C_Group} order by C_Time desc
select count(C_Number) from Crawler where C_Number >0
